meanings.definition: The quality or state of being silly or foolish.
meanings.sent1: Her constant dippiness always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: His dippiness was evident in the way he told jokes.
meanings.sent3: The dippiness of the situation made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dippiness of the clown's performance was infectious.
meanings.sent5: The dippiness of the puppy playing in the park was adorable.

meanings.definition: A foolish or silly action or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Running around in circles was just pure dippiness.
meanings.sent2: His dippiness in class often led to laughter from his classmates.
meanings.sent3: The dippiness of wearing socks on his hands made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her dippiness in trying to juggle oranges was entertaining.
meanings.sent5: The dippiness of the cat chasing its tail was amusing to watch.
